title: General-Level and General-Bench Released for Evaluating Multimodal Generalists
summary: We release General-Level, a 5-scale evaluation framework for assessing multimodal generalists, and General-Bench, a comprehensive benchmark with over 700 tasks and 325K instances. Evaluation on 100+ state-of-the-art MLLMs reveals current capability rankings and highlights key challenges toward general AI.

title: Welcome Dr. Liao Yue to LV-Lab as a Research Fellow
summary: Dr. Liao Yue joins LV-Lab as a Research Fellow. He previously served as a Postdoctoral Researcher at CUHK’s MMLab and received his Ph.D. from Beihang University. His research focuses on multimodal understanding and embodied AI.

title: Prof. Shuicheng Yan Returns to Lead the LV-Lab, Evolving from Learning and Vision to Language and Vision
summary: We are honored to welcome Prof. Shuicheng Yan back to lead the lab. Reflecting a shift in research focus, LV-Lab has evolved from 'Learning and Vision' to 'Language and Vision'—preserving the acronym while marking a new chapter in its intellectual trajectory.
